text: The 2011 Bengal alcohol poisonings killed 167 people in December 2011 in the eastern Indian state of West Bengal after consumption of spurious liquor mixed with methanol (methyl alcohol). ==See also== *Alcohol prohibition in India *List of alcohol poisonings in India == References == Category:Alcohol-related deaths in India Category:2011 disasters in India Category:Crime in West Bengal Category:December 2011 events in Asia
title: 2011 Bengal alcohol poisonings
